survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to improve service quality, accessibility, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users by frequency of use. Use a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most frequently use?
questions.client_notes: This question identifies charging level preferences. Ensure options are clear to non-technical users.

script.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most frequently use?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: This helps prioritize improvements. Use checkboxes for multi-select.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'This is my first time' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'This is my first time' to Q1

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'This is my first time' to Q1
questions.client_notes: This identifies pain points. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specifics.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open text (MULTI_CHOICE with open text for 'Other')

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'This is my first time' to Q1

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional feedback or suggestions for improving public EV charging stations.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional feedback or suggestions for improving public EV charging stations.
